name: Casey Taylor: Ace Attorney
storyline:
Four cases was planned, but only case 1 was finished
Case 1: The First Suit
Case 2: The Band Suit
Case 3: Suited for Technology
Case 4: The Family Suit
summary:
Casey Taylor: Ace Attorney is set around 20 years after Spirit of Justice,
and it is a story about a recently graduated attorney who had just founded his own law firm with his grandfather.
His expertise for the moment is civil lawsuits, but he will come to learn that some insignificant looking cases can hide the biggest conspiracies.
